column4: Hi, I enabled compiz in Ubuntu 10.04 desktop. For some reason my terminal window is transparent now even though the transparency is turned off in the terminal profile options. I am trying to disable the transparency. Any ideas?
make sure your looking at the right profile?
mkaay, I only have one profile
one and default? or just the default?
the funny thing is that if i enable transparency in the terminal profile options, it becomes even more transparent
